name: Tanvir Mahmud
label: Full Stack Developer | Software Engineer
summary: Full Stack Developer with hands-on experience building web applications using React, .NET Core, Python, Java, and SQL Server. Passionate about scalable, cloud-based solutions and committed to clean, testable code. Proven ability to collaborate in Agile teams and deliver impactful software projects. Runner-up at Ontario Public Service Hackathon for chatbot innovation.

work_experience.summary: Design and develop custom CRM desktop applications using WPF and C#. Build robust backend logic with SQL Server and manage version control using Azure Repos.
highlights: Built WPF desktop applications for CRM systems using C#, XAML, and the MVVM pattern.
Implemented key CRM features such as customer search filters, report generation, and audit logging.
Utilized Dapper ORM for lightweight and performant database access with SQL Server.
Developed and optimized SQL stored procedures and tables in SQL Server Management Studio.
Used Azure Repos for source control and collaborative development workflows.

work_experience.summary: Developed internal tools and Python APIs to support data workflows and monitoring in a public sector environment.
highlights: Supported internal applications by automating workflows and writing backend APIs using Python/Flask.
Monitored application performance and diagnosed system bottlenecks, improving system response time.
Collaborated with development and database teams to address integration and functionality issues.
Wrote scripts to extract system data from Linux servers for real-time analysis.

work_experience.summary: Provided frontline support for campus-wide IT issues, system imaging, and documentation to enhance support services.
highlights: Provided first-level technical support for academic software and enterprise applications.
Performed system imaging, OS deployment, and software installations for over 100 faculty/student devices.
Created and maintained setup and troubleshooting documentation for IT processes.
Assisted users in resolving software issues and provided training for application usage.

projects.title: Inventory Management System
projects.summary: A full-stack ASP.NET Core app hosted on AWS for inventory control and access management.
highlights: Implemented role-based access control and form validation.
Integrated AWS RDS and S3 bucket for secure backend operations.
Deployed using Elastic Beanstalk with CI/CD integration.

projects.title: Backend Monitoring Tool
projects.summary: A FastAPI application for monitoring server health and logging system alerts.
highlights: Developed custom Python scripts to parse logs and generate alerts.
Tested and deployed REST endpoints for real-time health checks.
Streamlined error detection with proactive monitoring features.

degrees: Advanced Diploma in Software Engineering Technology

interests.name: Open Source Contribution
interests.summary: Interested in contributing to Python, .NET, and DevOps-related projects to support collaborative software development.

interests.name: Fintech Innovations
interests.summary: Exploring technologies that streamline payment systems and improve user experience in financial platforms.

references.name: Lyle Williams
references.reference: Tanvir demonstrated excellent technical and communication skills while supporting our IT infrastructure. He was dependable and took initiative on every task assigned.

references.name: Marcus Seong
references.reference: It was a pleasure working with Tanvir. He consistently showed strong problem-solving abilities and was always eager to help the team succeed.
